title: Rembrandt's - The Three Crosses
creator_credit: Balfour Films, Arts Council of Great Britain and Dudley Shaw Ashton
brief_description: A detailed account of the engraving of the original plate for Rembrandt’s celebrated print; the artist’s experimental use of different papers and methods of inking, and the later re-working of the plate. Commentary written and spoken by Christopher White.
creator_credit_for_label: Balfour Films, Arts Council of Great Britain and Dudley Shaw Ashton
